resources.string: Control many different types of system animations
Press on color below to apply
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Option to enable or disable the navigation bar
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation

Navigation bar must be disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Last app
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Swipe three fingers to take screenshot
This is test for selected toast animation
Customize the animations of each window in system
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Select certian apps to hide in recents
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Enable or disable ram bar in recent app view
Enable / disable custom styling of recent apps view
Enable / disable rotation of clear all button
Vibrate clear all button on press
Enable / disable haptic feedback of dismiss all button
Longpress updates memory bar if present
Shows clock at the top while in immersive
Shows date at the top while in immersive
Immersive recents setting is overridden if the expanded desktop is enabled.
Change the view of the recents screen

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also double tap on track info to skip track.
Show buttons to increase or decrease the brightness
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
Disable quick settings tiles on secured lockscreen
Show the clock widget on the lockscreen
Show the date, weather, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Change volume panel from right side to left side
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Select an image to use for static mode
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Apply a custom icon pack for Recents panel
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
Shows white visualization bars on ambient display unless custom color is selected
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see a significant improvement in battery life. For a good user experience, we recommend you set the amount of disabled pixels at 75 percent.
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Use default statusbar height in Hide
